short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install HEX color picker chrome extension and get all color codes with single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The HEX color picker is a Chrome extension that allows you to pick colors from any web page. It is a simple and easy-to-use tool that can be used by anyone, regardless of their technical expertise. 

How to use  

>> Install the extension 
>> Go to the web page that you want to pick colors from. 
>> Click on the HEX color picker icon in the Chrome toolbar. 
>> Click on the color that you want to pick. 
>> The HEX & RGB color code for the selected color will be copied to your clipboard. 

Key features  

>> It can pick colors from any web page. 
>> It can display colors in HEX, RGB 
>> It can be used to create custom color palettes. 
>> It is a free and open-source extension. 

Whom Is It Most Useful For?  

>> Web development 
>>Graphic design 
>> WordPress Developer 
>> UI UX designer 

If you are looking for a simple and easy-to-use tool for picking colors from web pages, then the HEX color finder is the perfect extension for you.
